description.narrative: 1.2 By end of 2014, responsible government institutions have amended social and child protection laws, have expanded integrated social protection and inclusion programmes and increased allocations of resources at municipal level,which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Public Finance And Local Governance, Social Protection, Social Protection And Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By end of 2014, responsible government institutions prioritise investmen ts for childrenÂ´s rights, social protection and inclusion programmes, wi th the participation of civil society, children and young people.
